info.summary: Manages docker+agent (e.g. dockereto) worker stateful sets used by Opereto as tools and operation processing endpoints
Manages docker+agent (e.g. dockereto) worker pods used by Opereto as operation tools and processing endpoints
Run any custom task worker or test tool container as a pod on Opereto elastic workers k8s cluster

name: Opereto Kubernetes Services
summary: Wrap automation and test tools as Kubernetes components and use them on-demand.
description: Kubernetes (k8s) is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. Opereto kubernetes services allowing to setup, operate and teardown on-demand kubernetes-based worker pods and statefulsets. Workers can be packed as agent-embedded containers (dockereto) or as command containers executed by standard Opereto elastic workers.
